alert.note: Alert for Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine; Hill County; Northern Blaine County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued February 24 at 11:59AM MST until February 25 at 12:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST SATURDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT NOON MST TODAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. * WHERE...Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine, Hill County and Northern Blaine County. * WHEN...Until Noon MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.

area.areaDesc: Bears Paw Mountains and Southern Blaine; Hill County; Northern Blaine County
